name: onnbtwn
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wn(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1, csuc(c0)))))

comment: There is no set between an ordinal number and its successor. Proposition 7.25 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 41. (Contributed by NM, 9-Jun-1994.)
